summary: A devious sexpot steals her husband's drug money and hides out in a small town where she meets the perfect dupe for her next scheme.
cast: Linda Fiorentino|Bill Pullman|Michael Raysses|Zack Phifer|Peter Berg|Brien Varady|Dean Norris|Donna W. Scott|Mik Scriba|J.T. Walsh|Erik-Anders Nilsson|Patricia R. Caprio|Herb Mitchell|Bill Nunn|Renee Rogers|Billy Stevenson|Walter Addison|Anne Flanagan|Mike Lisenco|Serena|Michelle Davison|Jack Shearer
title: La última seducción
